sentences.sentence: The two pandas, named Xing Ya and Wu Wen, are both more than 3 years old and will stay in the country for scientific research for 15 years, according to Xinhua.
sentences.translation: 据新华社报道，这两只大熊猫名为“星雅”和“武雯”，都已超过3岁，并将留在该国进行15年的科学研究。

sentences.sentence: Hiking along De-Ga-Ya-So creek, Letchworth State Park, in Perry, New York.
sentences.translation: 沿着位于纽约佩里的莱奇沃思州立公园的 De-Ga-Ya-So 小溪徒步旅行。
